Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: The batteries and the charger are really good according with his price. With the price of this product you aren't able to buy one genuine panasonic battery, so I think it's a good deal.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1600 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Memory Card Wallet + USB SDHC Card Reader
Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
(See Description for MORE!)
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1600 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement DMW-BLC12 Battery and Charger Kit + Memory Card Wallet + SDHC Card USB Reader + Deluxe Starter Kit for Panasonic Lumix FZ200 Digital Camera and Panasonic DMW-BLC12
